channel.title: Opinion on Pranav's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Opinion on Pranav's Blog

item.title: Twitters Downfall
item.description: Prologue Unless you’re living under a rock, you would know that Elon Musk bought Twitter.Â For all the people living in a cave Twitter is the world’s largest micro-blogging app, rivaled only by Koo, it also happens to be the worst place to share your opinion, Rivaled only by a school. Originally, Twitter was meant to be a place where you could share anything you want - from your daily life to your opinion on the news - without having to worry about being suppressed.
